parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the text on the right side of the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user dialog. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>control '''lbSetTextRight''' [index, name] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [index, name]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> name: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetTextRight]] [0, "iskoda"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetText]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetPictureColor]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
